parameters.name: ListenerPort
parameters.description:
The frontend port that is used by the HTTPS listener of the SLB instance.

Valid values: **1 to 65535**.

parameters.name: LoadBalancerId
parameters.description: The ID of the SLB instance.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the Server Load Balancer (SLB) instance.

parameters.name: ServerCertificateId
parameters.description: The ID of the certificate used by the domain name.
